welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairless Hills, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport is used for private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport is equipped to handle all types of cargo and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport is a small but modern facility, equipped with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
